title: Where is Timothy Fogerty who stabbed Steve Buscemi in April 2001 in Wilmington.  What is he doing now?  Is the Firebelly Lounge still around?
text:
Here's a link to the MySpace page belonging to Timothy Fogerty,
formerly of Wilmington: http://www.myspace.com/cbrtfo.



Also, the Firebelly Lounge is indeed still operating in downtown
Wilmington:
http://events.starnewsonline.com/wilmington-nc/venues/show/452076-firebelly-lounge
